'''Éothain''' is a [[Rohirrim|boy]] of [[Rohan]] who was sent to [[Edoras]] with his sister. Éothain was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]], where he was portrayed by [[Sam Comery]].

==History==
Éothain and his younger sister [[Freda]] were sent by their mother [[Morwen (film character)|Morwen]] to alert [[Théoden|King Théoden]] that the [[Dunlendings|Wild Men]] were pillaging through [[Rohan]]. Éothain and Freda were kept safe at [[Edoras]] until Théoden led his people to [[Helm's Deep]], where they were reunited with their mother.

==See also==
*[[Éothain]], a wholly distinct character within the book who shares the same name.
